name: Nice Catch! A Fishing RPG
description:
Nice Catch!  A Fishing RPG is a short fishing game with RPG stat progression.  

The great Terra Fish is about to awaken, and the only way to tame it is through the power of fishing!  Train to become a master angler before it wakes up, and quell the massive fish before it gets angry and causes havoc!

Raise stats such as Strength, Dexterity and Ease to become stronger at fishing.  Every fish you catch makes you a better angler!

Made in 48 hours for the Redmond/Eastside Online Game Jam V in 2020.
